Articles.Content:
> 
> Please don't take this wrong, but I am granting this the title of Worst Mod Ever.
> No offense of course ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Aww thanks** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I laughed SOO hard at this XD

> 
> I laughed SOO hard at this XD

Are you okay? When I saw this I went into cardiac arrest
I'm terrified....what has been seen....can never ever ever be unseen....not even by the blinding light of a million supernova reflecting off of Mr. Manely's glorious head can bleach my eyes of this.
Hullo! This is awful.
Okay my new nightmare for the week has just come in...
This is ok. I didn't want to sleep tonight anyway.

> 
> This is ok. I didn't want to sleep tonight anyway.

Do you need more anti-sleep content? :>
a good reason to kill kerbals now!

> 
> a good reason to kill kerbals now!

Good reason you say? What if Danny will install this? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
This is reaaaally creepy. Thanks for my new nightmare.

> 
> Good reason you say? What if Danny will install this? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

That was actually one of my first thoughts, after the epic fear, when I saw this.

In an act of blatant plagiarism I'll rip off someone's reaction to another mod to a different game:

*"people are starving to death in this world... and somebody had time for this....."*
Oh, God. Best mod ever.

> 
> In an act of blatant plagiarism I'll rip off someone's reaction to another mod to a different game:
> *"people are starving to death in this world... and somebody had time for this....."*

What was this game? And what was this mod? I'm interested ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

These will surely scare away the kraken.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-23T05:00:42Z" title="07/23/2015 05:00  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 23, 2015</time> by PanWieldingMann**
Halloween is just a few months away and this will scare the bejebus out of everybody.

+666 rep

this is ACTUALLY scaring me.
My bones have been rattled with the force of a million Hullos.

I just found this mod and LOL. SO disturbing. Why, why did you make this?! I was expecting a Scott Manley Kerbal look alike skin, this is just creepy! I want to know Scott Manley's reaction to this mod.

> 
> I just found this mod and LOL. SO disturbing. Why, why did you make this?! I was expecting a Scott Manley Kerbal look alike skin, this is just creepy! I want to know Scott Manley's reaction to this mod.

He already posted it

> 
> Of course it's legit.
> is it wise? that's the real question.

> 
> > 
> > Umm I would anticipate this mod being featured on his channel within the week. If not tomorrow.
> 
> 
> Nope, I have too many young viewers.
After two weeks and fifteen pages of comments, I think I'm starting to see a consensus.
Remove the smile which shows teeth and it will look better.
Scott Manley is dead, we killed him.
